channel.title: Security on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Security on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: BackTime: Backdoor Attacks on Multivariate Time Series Forecasting
item.description: BACKTIME unveils effective backdoor attacks on multivariate time series forecasting, highlighting vulnerabilities and offering novel defense strategies.

item.title: Conjugate Bayesian Two-step Change Point Detection for Hawkes Process
item.description: A novel conjugate Bayesian two-step change point detection method for Hawkes processes, CoBay-CPD, achieves higher accuracy and efficiency by employing data augmentation for improved dynamic event mod…

item.title: DiffuPac: Contextual Mimicry in Adversarial Packets Generation via Diffusion Model
item.description: DiffuPac generates realistic adversarial network packets evading NIDS detection without requiring specific NIDS knowledge, outperforming existing methods.

item.title: Regret Minimization in Stackelberg Games with Side Information
item.description: This research shows how to improve Stackelberg game strategies by considering side information, achieving no-regret learning in online settings with stochastic contexts or followers.

item.title: Stabilizing Linear Passive-Aggressive Online Learning with Weighted Reservoir Sampling
item.description: Weighted reservoir sampling stabilizes online learning algorithms by creating a robust ensemble of intermediate solutions, significantly improving accuracy and mitigating sensitivity to outliers.

item.title: Suitable is the Best: Task-Oriented Knowledge Fusion in Vulnerability Detection
item.description: KF-GVD: a novel knowledge fusion-based method boosts vulnerability detection accuracy by integrating task-specific knowledge into graph neural networks, achieving significant performance gains and dis…

item.title: SWE-agent: Agent-Computer Interfaces Enable Automated Software Engineering
item.description: SWE-agent achieves state-of-the-art performance on software engineering benchmarks by creating a custom agent-computer interface that enhances LM agents’ ability to use computers.

item.title: Unveiling and Mitigating Backdoor Vulnerabilities based on Unlearning Weight Changes and Backdoor Activeness
item.description: Two-Stage Backdoor Defense (TSBD) unveils and mitigates backdoor vulnerabilities by cleverly unlearning weight changes and suppressing backdoor neuron activeness, significantly improving the robustnes…
